text: Mother Didn't Tell Me is a 1950 American comedy movie. It was directed by Claude Binyon. The movie is based on the 1949 book The Doctor Wears Three Faces by Mary Bard. Actors include Dorothy McGuire, William Lundigan, June Havoc, Gary Merrill, and Jessie Royce Landis. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Mother Didn't Tell Me
